Class Amortization

  • java.lang.Object
    • Amortization
  • public class Amortization
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to compute amortization schedule given financing parameters passed by user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Amortization​(double loanAmount, double loanDuration, double numberLoanPaymentsPerYear, double loanInterestRate)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void calculateAmortizationSchedule()
      This Method will compute the full Amortization Schedule for the loan
      double[] getCumulativeTotalPayments()
      Getter method to retrieve cumulative total payments (principal + interest) for all periods
      double[] getInterestPayments()
      Getter method to retrieve all Interest Payments
      double[] getLoanBalances()
      Getter method to retrieve Balances for all periods
      double[] getPrincipalPayments()
      Getter method to retrieve all Principal Payments

    • Constructor Detail

      • Amortization

        public Amortization​(double loanAmount,
                    double loanDuration,
                    double numberLoanPaymentsPerYear,
                    double loanInterestRate)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        loanAmount - the amount of financing required for the project
        loanDuration - the duration in years of the financing agreement
        numberLoanPaymentsPerYear - the number of loan payments required each year
        loanInterestRate - the cost of financing reported as an annual interest rate

      • getCumulativeTotalPayments

        public double[] getCumulativeTotalPayments()
        Getter method to retrieve cumulative total payments (principal + interest) for all periods
        Returns:
        cumulative out of pocket financing payments for each period
